title: crackshot成品分享！dalao可以不用看了（原创）不喜勿喷~~
author: 桃姊
txt_content:
crackshot成品分享！dalao可以不用看了（原创）不喜勿喷~~        emmmmmm
今天给来分享一下自己的crackshot成品！！！适合给萌新做一个示范吧！
   dalao可以不用看了！！！ 






一把普通的步枪
魔方:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&4&l魔方&e&l辐射步枪"
        Item_Type: 153
        Item_Lore: "&4&l采用高科技技术，&5&l利用魔方完全体打造而成|&b&l并且其中采用了次元科技技术！&9&l威力更加突出|&4&l————————————————————|&5&l伤害：&e&l450|&5&l后坐力：&e&l无|&5&l精准性：&e&l中~~开镜高|&4&l————————————————————|&5&l&n特殊能力|&c&l量子化领域加强：&e&l有15%的几率暴击造成额外300伤害|&c&l量子化领域暂停：&e&l每次暴击可以使敌人不可移动3秒|&4&l————————————————————|&2&l我永远喜欢&e&l萝&5&l莉 "
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Recoil_Amount: 0
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: snowball
        Projectile_Speed: 40
        Projectile_Damage: 450
        Bullet_Spread: 1
        Sounds_Shoot: IRONGOLEM_HIT-1-2-0,SKELETON_HURT-1-2-0,ZOMBIE_WOOD-1-2-0
    Sneak:
        Enable: true
        No_Recoil: true
        Bullet_Spread: 0
    Fully_Automatic:
        Enable: true
        Fire_Rate: 6
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 30
        Reload_Duration: 60
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: ITEM_BREAK-1-1-0
        Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Close_Duration: 10
        Close_Shoot_Delay: 12
        Sound_Close: PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-0,PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-3
    Scope: 
        Enable: true
        Night_Vision: true
        Zoom_Amount: 5
        Zoom_Bullet_Spread: 0
        Sounds_Toggle_Zoom: ENDERDRAGON_WINGS-1-2-0
    Critical_Hits:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 300
        Chance: 15
        Message_Shooter: "&4&l欧尼酱！&b&l暴击了耶"
        Sounds_Shooter: CLICK-1-1-0,LEVEL_UP-1-2-0
    Potion_Effects:
        Activation: crit
        Potion_Effect_Victim: SLOW-60-15





一把普通的狙击枪
98k:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&e&lKar&4&l-&5&l98K&9&l"
        Item_Type: 291
        Item_Lore: "&e&lpvp武器|&4&l古老工艺技术制造而成|&b&l吃鸡必备神狙|&b&l自带8倍镜|&e&l——————————————|&5&l武器伤害：&e&l1000|&5&l后坐力：&e&l小|&5&l换弹速度：&e&l中|&5&l射速：&e&l中|&e&l——————————————|&b&lKAR丶暴击：&2&l每发子弹有30%的几率暴击，额外造成1000血|&b&lKAR丶爆头：&2&l击中头部额外造成1000伤害|&e&l——————————————|&9&l寂寞深闺,柔肠寸愁千缕.惜春春,几点催花雨"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Recoil_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Delay_Between_Shots: 40
        Projectile_Type: arrow
        Remove_Arrows_On_Impact: true
        Projectile_Damage: 1000
        Bullet_Spread: 0.5
        Projectile_Speed: 10000
        Sounds_Shoot: WITHER_SHOOT-3-2-0,EXPLODE-2-2-0
    Sneak:
        Enable: true
        No_Recoil: true
        Bullet_Spread: 0.3
        Sneak_Before_Shooting: false
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 5
        Reload_Bullets_Individually: true
        Reload_Duration: 20
        Sounds_Reloading: IRONGOLEM_THROW-1-2-0
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: pump
        Open_Duration: 20
        Close_Duration: 20
        Sound_Open: PISTON_EXTEND-1-2-0
        Sound_Close: PISTON_EXTEND-1-2-0
    Scope:
        Enable: true
        Night_Vision: true
        Zoom_Amount: 8
        Zoom_Bullet_Spread: 0
        Zoom_Before_Shooting: false
        Sounds_Toggle_Zoom: NOTE_STICKS-1-2-0
        Particle_Player_Shoot: FLAMES-10
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
    Critical_Hits:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 1000
        Chance: 30
        Message_Shooter: "&e&l暴击&b&lUP"
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Player_Shoot: flames-10
        Particle_Impact_Anything: block_break-10
    Headshot:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 1000
        Message_Shooter: "&4&l爆头！！！"





步枪+榴弹发射器
90级副本枪械:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&4AK&c-&b47 &5&l次元&9&l风暴"
        Item_Type: 265
        Item_Lore: "&0&l采用钢铁核心制作而成|&c&l经过次元枪芯的升级|&c&l枪身的重量比其他普通武器都要重|&5&l威力大大增强|&4--------------------|&4&l伤害：&e&l2100~&4&l榴弹伤害：&e&l40&e&l-&e&l90%|&4&l后坐力：&e&l无|&4&l射速：&e&l中|&4&l稳定性：&e&l高|&4--------------------|&4&l钢筋铁骨：&e&l增加子弹推进动力！&c&l多次打中拥有伤害叠加！|&4&l次元黑洞：&e&l右键切换榴弹模式！&d&l爆炸会将周围单位吸附至引爆点|&4&l次元之能：&e&l放弃以前的低射速射速改为点射&b&l手速越快！射速越快！|&4&l————————————————————|&4&l榴弹发射到自己太近的地方不会爆炸！"
        Attachments:
            Type: main
            Info: "次元榴弹"
            Toggle_Delay: 5
            Sounds_Toggle: NOTE_STICKS-1-2-0
    Shooting:
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 0
        Recoil_Amount: 0
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Damage: 2100
        Projectile_Type: egg
        Bullet_Spread: 0
        Projectile_Speed: 40
        Sounds_Shoot: BLAZE_HIT-1-1-0,BLAZE_BREATH-1-2-0
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Starting_Amount: 75
        Reload_Amount: 75
        Reload_Duration: 60
        Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Close_Duration: 10
        Sound_Open: NOTE_STICKS-1-0-0,PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-2
        Sound_Close: PISTON_EXTEND-1-2-0
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Player_Shoot: block_break-79
        Particle_Terrain: true
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true

emmmmmmm


不喜勿喷！！谢谢！！！

replies.author: 桃姊
replies.txt_content: emmm第一次发这样的帖子！不怎么会做！所以就不小心把枪放在了第二页！！不好意思！！！
